# strokeStart

**Instance Property**

The unit distance along the circle where the stroke starts.

## Declaration

```swift
var strokeStart: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property and [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKCircleRenderer/strokeEnd] to render a portion of the line. As a unit distance, [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKCircleRenderer/strokeStart] must be a value between 0 and 1. A unit distance of 0 represents the top of the circle and the stroke draws in a clockwise direction.

## Accessing the stroke

- **strokeEnd**: The unit distance along the circle where the stroke ends.
